channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for SC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for SC

item.title: Report X-2023090543
item.description:
Report X-2023090543

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-05T15:12:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-06
  • City: SPARTANBURG
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE DROPPED WHILE LOADING. HAZMAT-CERTIFIED ADMIN NOTIFIED OF DAMAGED HAZMAT PACKAGE. DescribePack: BOTTLE LEAKED FROM UNDER CAP AS A RESULT OF PACKAGE BEING DROPPED. SEAL ON BOTTLE TOP LOOSE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: HAZMAT-CERTIFIED ADMIN REORIENTED THE PACKAGE INSIDE A LINED HAZMAT TOTE AND SECURED THE TOTE INSIDE THE HAZMAT CAGE.
